## 


 * 10
code

```cpp
int translate ( char *c, int len ){
	int i, res = 0;
	for ( i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ ){
		res *= 10;
		res += ( c[i] - '0' );
	}

	return res;
}
```

$$0, 1, 0, 1, 2, 0, 3, 1, 4, 2, 5, 0, 6$$
$n$ $\frac{n}{2}$

case : $n$

case $\frac{n}{4}$ $\to \lfloor \frac{n}{4} \rfloor$
case $f ( 2, \frac{n}{2} ) \to$

$$f ( k, n ) =
\begin{cases}
n, & \text{if $k$ is $1$} \
\begin{cases}
\frac{n}{2}, & \text{if $n$ is even} \
\lfloor \frac{n}{4} \rfloor, & \text{if $n = 4\times k + 1 ( k \in \mathbb{R} )$ } \
f ( 2, \frac{n}{2} ), & \text{if $n = 4\times k + 3 ( k \in \mathbb{R} )$ }
\end{cases}, & \text{if $k$ is $2$ }
\end{cases}
$$
